Entries.default: A ship appears on the horizon, riding low in the water.
[Hail the ship and prepare to board.]

The vessel boasts the sharp angles and flat front of a junk, but it does not fly the colors of Rauatai or any other naval power. Its banners identify it as a merchant ship.

The craft's hull appears heavily reinforced, and its gun ports bristle with cannons, but it cuts a non-hostile path through the sea.
